name: pseumo
description:
2D 4 player car battle game. Inspired by games like SmashBros and Rocket League. Currently includes 2 versus modes that allows 4 local players and 4 bots in Free for All or Teams. "GoalBall" game mode with goals on either side or "Survival" sumo-style battle. Keyboard & Gamepads supported.

Abilities:  Jump (Up or A/X).  Dash (Double Tap Direction or L/R).  Tire Grip (Down or B/◯).

On the way: 4 player local coop adventure mode & more game modes for versus.

Newer versions often available for donators on request.

Developed in GameMaker Studio 1.4.
